sentences.english: Is now a tier 4 talent and is a prerequisite for the new Master Demonologist talent.
sentences.chinese: 它现在是一个4级天赋，是新天赋恶魔掌握的前置。

sentences.english: What do the devs want them to be "easily" killed by?
sentences.chinese: 恶魔们希望他们可以“轻易的”被杀死？

sentences.english: the Number of the Beast, base 6.
sentences.chinese: 这是6进制下的恶魔之数。

sentences.english: Master Demonologist (Felhunter) will now also reduce damage taken by Holy.
sentences.chinese: 恶魔学识大师现在也能减免神圣伤害。

sentences.english: There's no doubt I look like the evil undead.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问我看上去就像个不死的恶魔。

sentences.english: Crypt Fiend pathing size slightly increased.
sentences.chinese: 地穴恶魔的碰撞体积稍微增大。

sentences.english: Several demigods were killed during the War of the Ancients, overwhelmed by demons.
sentences.chinese: 已经有几个半神在远古战争时期被恶魔杀死。

sentences.english: He himself changes god of body deep and remote hearse, serve for devil.
sentences.chinese: 他自己变身幽灵车神，为恶魔服务。

sentences.english: Now the Spirit of the LORD had departed from Saul, and an evil spirit from the LORD tormented him.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的灵离开扫罗，有恶魔从耶和华那里来扰乱他。

sentences.english: The children pretend not to know how to get on the sawhorse so the devil's wife demonstrates.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们假装不知怎么上据木架，恶魔之妻上架示范。

sentences.english: His frustration was interrupted when the gargoyle from the roof came crashing through the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 城主的挫败感被一个从房顶穿过入室的恶魔打断了。

sentences.english: I was desribed of class A hope can apply to join, XXX demon club.
sentences.chinese: 我是高一A班的XXX，希望能申请加入恶魔俱乐部。

sentences.english: Blanks can't be requested for those heroes.
sentences.chinese: 恶魔英雄的牌组不能申请空白卡。

sentences.english: Besides we may make more fiends in sports.
sentences.chinese: 除了我们在运动可能使更多的恶魔。

sentences.english: The silver-tongued devil couldn't get the deal done on cap and trade.
sentences.chinese: 该银舌恶魔无法获取上限和贸易所做的交易。

definition: leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
to degrade/to degenerate/to become depraved/corrupt/a fall from grace
